summary:
harry: you know, one of the things i love about you is that you never lie. you’re not a liar.
voldemort: how did you say...
body:
harry: you know, one of the things i love about you is that you never lie. you’re not a liar.

voldemort: how did you say that?

harry: your nose never grew.

title: We’re All Fallen
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/30BDcLI

by ashes_and_ashes

Remus exhaled, hard, spreading the robe out on the bed.
He knew, knew that if he checked the pocket or the hood or the label at the hem he would find the words. Sirius Orion Black, neatly embroidered in impeccable writing, the threads still gleaming even after all these years.
He had left it in Remus’ chest, during his last night at Hogwarts. He never came back for it.

Words: 4266, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Remus Lupin, James Potter, Marlene McKinnon, Dorcas Meadowes, Gideon Prewett, Fabian Prewett, Sirius Black, Lily Evans
  • Relationships: Sirius Black/Remus Lupin, James Potter/Lily Evans Potter, Marlene McKinnon/Dorcas Meadowes, i’ll more as I keep writing
  • Additional Tags: wolfstar, Slow Burn, Angst, wolfstar angst, Hurt/Comfort, villian au, AU, Wolfstar AU, Marauders, Marauders era, first wizarding war

blog.name: alex-writes-for-harry-potter
blog.title: Harry Potter Imagines and Drabbles
blog.description: Two young women of color writing for Harry Potter. {REQUESTS ARE OPEN}

summary: Anonymous asked: Tonks falling for a black girl? Nymphadora Andromeda Tonks (who would kill you if you dared calling her that)...
body:
Anonymous asked:

Tonks falling for a black girl?

Nymphadora Andromeda Tonks (who would kill you if you dared calling her that) was once again alone. Her friends had deserted her for their own activities and she, with her free period, was desperately bored.

With a sigh, she put away the book she had been reading and quietly exited the library. There was nothing in there that would captivate her for long anyway. She drew her robes closer to her petite frame and breathed out slowly. Her hair slowly changed color from a dull brown to a vibrant pink that glittered in the sunlight as she stepped out to the outdoor grounds.

The warm sunshine stopped her shivering and made her relax. She smiled and adjusted her tie - an old habit of hers - walking towards the lake. Her eyes scanned the area around her, and what she saw made the irises flash a bright red with anger.

Several girls - Hufflepuff girls, a fact that made Nymphadora’s blood boil - were ganging up on one person. Judging by the pitch of the screams and sobs that could be heard, it was a female. The pink-haired girl stormed over, drawing her wand and pointing it towards the patch of grass where the bullies and victim were struggling on top of.

“Confringo!”

The ground split open and immediately began caving in on itself. The girls fell, screaming in terror. And Nymphadora stood with a wide, wicked grin that was utterly unbefitting of her sharply defined elfin features as she approached the lone victim.

Her skin was darker than any tan could ever be. A sheer glossy brown that was a similar shade to her clear doe eyes; it made Nymphadora think of the rich soil beneath their feet. And those eyes locked onto hers as she identified her savior. With a squeal, the girl hugged her, causing Nymphadora to freeze. The only two people who had ever touched her in any way before were her parents, and even they weren’t particularly affectionate with her. Her blood boiled again, and her cheeks burned. She couldn’t quite explain the mixed relief and longing that she felt after the girl let her go.

“Thank you so much,” the girl quietly whispered into Nymphadora’s ear, just as she had turned to leave. “What is your name? I must know.” Despite her mother’s voice in her head warning her of stranger danger, Nymphadora knew there would be no harm in giving her her name. After all, they were peers. What would happen?

“My name is Dora.”

“I am Lindiwe. Thank you once again, Dora. You saved me.”

Nymphadora shivered at the pure sensuality of her delicate smile, yet she couldn’t help but return it with her own. She pressed a kiss to Lindiwe’s cheek. “My pleasure.”

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Lily Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

trail.content_raw:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Lily Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

summary: Drarry Fic Rec #30 (or something like that)
title: Drarry Fic Rec #30 (or something like that)
body:
You And Me by bixgirl1

For an elite masterlist of my top Drarry fics of all time click here 

 Word Count: 27,619

Summary: When Harry sits down with Malfoy, he’s really only looking for a reprieve from the constant stares and whispers. (Mostly.) What he gets instead are a series of strange events that lead to a friendship that is something else, questions that nobody knows how to answer, and the realisation that the person that Harry doesn’t know how to hate, anymore, seems to be the person who knows exactly what he needs.A story in which everything is complicated. And yet, somehow, none of it is.

My Notes: I know I’ve been on a bixgirl1 kick lately, but a master is a master, and really, can you blame me? As for this fic, its a short but beautiful one. All the conflict is more internal than anything else, so it makes for a less stressful read than a lot of fics. There is a softness to Draco and Harry in this that I think we need more of.

Warnings: Mild Dom!Harry and Sub!Draco, EWE

Excerpt:

“Then what do you want?” Harry said. “What was that, last week?”

Malfoy’s lips pressed into a tight line, whitening around the edges. His eyes narrowed and he refused to answer. The silence between them dragged out and the growing bubble of fury in Harry’s chest suddenly popped, spilled. He took a step back and felt his lip curl in disgust.

“I can’t believe you’re going to be this way,” he ground out, sharp and vicious. It felt good, so damn good, to give into that old resentment, the kind he’d never been allowed to openly nurture before he realized he no longer needed it. All of that frustration that he’d been so careful to stow away now boiled to the surface. “After we were getting on, after—after everything, I can’t believe you’re going to pretend nothing happened. More fool me, I guess. You know what, Malfoy? Why don’t you suck my cock.”

Malfoy’s eyes shot up to his, intense and compelling, and the air seemed to thicken and vibrate around them. In one slow, fluid motion, without breaking his gaze, Malfoy lowered to his knees.

Harry stared at him, gaping, the echo of his words still fading in his mind.

blog.name: potterish

blog.description: O único fã-site brasileiro premiado por J. K. Rowling | Conteúdo completo em Potterish.com ☇

summary: Montanha-russa de Harry Potter será a primeira dos Estados Unidos com queda livre vertical
title: Montanha-russa de Harry Potter será a primeira dos Estados Unidos com queda livre vertical
description:
Foram divulgados novos detalhes sobre a nova montanha-russa do parque de Harry Potter em Orlando, nos Estados Unidos, que será a primeira montanha-russa de histórias do mundo. A atração, batizada de Hagrid’s Magical Creatures Motorbike Adventure, será inaugurada em 13 de junho de 2019 na área de Hogsmead do The Wizarding World of Harry Potter, que está localizada no parque Universal’s Islands of Adventure.

Na atração os visitantes poderão voar dentro da Floresta Proibida, que foi reproduzida com uma floresta real de 1.200 árvores. Durante o passeio, independentemente de estarem nas motocicletas ou nos carros laterais adjacentes, os visitantes poderão subir acima das árvores, acelerar rapidamente e avançar para a frente – e para trás. A montanha-russa foi construída com tecnologia inovadora tornando-a a atração com o maior número de lançamentos do mundo, com um total de 7 lançamentos. Ela também será a primeira montanha-russa dos Estados Unidos a apresentar queda livre vertical, e terá, durante o passeio, quedas de mais de 5 metros. Além disso os visitantes serão catapultados a 19 metros no ar em um ângulo de mais de 70 graus, caindo em seguida imediatamente para trás em um único movimento. Hagrid’s Magical Creatures Motorbike Adventure também será a montanha-russa mais longa da Flórida, com cerca de 1540 metros de comprimento.

CONTINUA DEPOIS DA PUBLICIDADE
(adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

Clique para exibir o slide.

Antes da viagem pela Floresta Proibida os visitantes visitarão ruínas, atras da cabana de Hagrid. O cenário foi produzido pela equipe criativa da Universal, em colaboração com o Designer de Produção dos filmes Harry Potter, Stuart Craig, e o Diretor de Arte, Alan Gilmore. Aqui eles poderão assistir à uma aula de Trato das Criaturas Mágicas com Hagrid.
Enquanto se dirigem para suas motocicletas, os visitantes verão materiais da aula, incluindo ovos de dragão e um viveiro onde Hagrid manteve seus Explosivins. Os visitantes também encontrarão outros personagens da série Harry Potter, incluindo Arthur Weasley, Hagrid e Canino.

Clique para exibir o slide.

Para mais informações sobre a nova atração, visite o site oficial do parque.

Leia também:
https://potterish.com/2019/05/harry-potter-novas-imagens-montanha-russa-parque/
Nova montanha-russa de Harry Potter será um passeio de até 80km/h pela Floresta Proibida

The post Montanha-russa de Harry Potter será a primeira dos Estados Unidos com queda livre vertical appeared first on Potterish.com.

summary: LORD TOBIAS SNAPE. Volatile. Powerful. Sadistic.
caption:
LORD TOBIAS SNAPE.

summary:
Draco: What if I buy one of those hairless cats? They look so elegant!
Harry: I'm not having one of those things as pets!...
body:
Draco: What if I buy one of those hairless cats? They look so elegant!
Harry: I'm not having one of those things as pets! They're scary!
Draco: They're too posh for your average taste!
Harry: I'll buy a ferret then
Draco: Or we can buy a hairy cat
